Class OCLImporter

  • Object
    • OCLImporter

  • public class OCLImporter
extends Object
    A utility class the provides methods to parse OCL expressions from different source.
    Author:
    Gwendal DANIEL

    • Method Detail

      • parseOCL

        public static Constraint parseOCL(URI location,
                                  EPackage ePackage)
                           throws MogwaiCoreException
        Parses the OCL file at the given location and returns the Constraint it contains.

        This method will register the given ePackage before parsing the file in order to avoid parsing errors.

        TODO Allow multiple constraints definition in a single OCL file

        Parameters:
        location - the URI of the OCL file to parse
        ePackage - the EPackage describing the meta-elements used in the constraints
        Returns:
        the Constraint contained in the OCL file
        Throws:
        MogwaiCoreException - if location cannot be parsed to a valid OCL Constraint

      • parseOCL

        public static Constraint parseOCL(URI location)
                           throws MogwaiCoreException
        Parses the OCL file at the given location and returns the Constraint is contains.

        This method assumes the EPackage accessed in the Constraint has been registered before.

        Parameters:
        location - the URI of the OCL file to parse
        Returns:
        the Constraint contained in the OCL file
        Throws:
        MogwaiCoreException - if location cannot be parsed to a valid OCL Constraint

      • parseInlineOCL

        public static OCLExpression parseInlineOCL(String oclExpression,
                                           EClassifier context)
                                    throws MogwaiCoreException
        Parses the provided textual oclExpression and returns the Constraint it defines.
        Parameters:
        oclExpression - the textual OCL expression to parse
        context - the EClassifier representing the context of the OCL expression to parse
        Returns:
        the Constraint parsed from the input oclExpression
        Throws:
        MogwaiCoreException - if the provided oclExpression cannot be parsed to a valid OCL Constraint
